it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.client

Class RMIHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.client.RMIHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemoteRMIHandler, Handler, java.rmi.Remote

    public class RMIHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements RemoteRMIHandler, Handler
    Handler reachable by server via remote stub that provides to server methods to call the view in the various phases of the game

    • Constructor Detail

      • RMIHandler

        public RMIHandler(java.lang.String n,
                  View v,
                  java.rmi.registry.Registry r,
                  java.lang.String rmn)
        Parameters:
        n - the name of the user associated to this handler
        v - the instance of the associated view
        r - the registry where the remote stub of this object resides
        rmn - the remote string associated with this object

    • Method Detail

      • closeConnections

        public void closeConnections()
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        activated by the disconnection manager, close this handler, unexport all the remote objects, and unbound the remote registry on the client side. Usually called when user doesn't respond over the maximum waiting time, to allow the other players to keep playing.
        Specified by:
        closeConnections in interface RemoteRMIHandler
        Specified by:
        closeConnections in interface Handler
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
